name: Juanito Arcade Mayhem
detailed_description:
Juanito Arcade Mayhem is a new arcade game that invites you to traverse the settings of classic videogames, spiced up with the popular Super Pang mechanics, hard enemies, and epic bosses. Experience saving the world from an alien invasion with your own hands before it’s too late.



When the mutant Clonocells from outer space attack, a young and lazy boy by the name of Juanito becomes our last hope. Chosen by Gluk, a bipolar manipulative alien, Juanito must enter an arcade cabinet and defend all the infected retro videogames, armed with nothing but his trusty pyjamas and his fearsome arsenal.



Fight like your life depends on it!

- 80+ unique levels, inspired by 8 classic arcade games.
- Original Soundtrack (with spicy retro flavour).
- Put your endurance to the test in Endless Survival Mode! How far can you go?
- Over 70 Steam Achievements that are just waiting to be unlocked.
- Dare to challenge the final boss and many others along the way in epic battles!



Don’t let the fun stop!

- Bring a friend along for Co-op Mode! Can the both of you overcome the clonocell invasion?
- More weapons and power-ups that you can count on one hand.
- Includes gorgeous-looking Steam Trading Cards for you to ogle!
- Controller and Keyboard compatibility.

Play it your way!

short_description: Juanito Arcade Mayhem revives all the retro classics in a 2D animated adventure fighting all kinds of aliens, old school enemies and epic bosses. Don your finest pyjamas and defend our favorite games from the alien Clonocell invasion!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, Windows 8.1 or Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 duo / AMD A4-3300M APU 1.90GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Card with 512 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
